title: Unicorn font
content:
Hello!!  
Does someone know a nice and simple typeface that could suit with Unicorn?  
 [http://www.dafont.com/unicorn-nf.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201144217/http:/www.dafont.com/unicorn-nf.font "http://www.dafont.com/unicorn-nf.font")  
Thank you!!
author: Annav0ig

comments.content: Perhaps something thin and more classically-based might work well as a contrast/counterpoint? Of course everything depends on the context. What are you trying to accomplish?
I agree with bemerx; perhaps futura thin, myriad or din
I quite like din and myriad, the font is for a project about fashion and addressed to girls, I was looking for some fancy ones, but maybe a simple sans-serif is better.Thank you!!
Maybe use one similar to the "my little pony" logo
